signals.Ask: We need a clear understanding of the pricing structure for AI features and whether we can opt out of AI to maintain current pricing.
signals.Evidence: Being honest with you, I think hiver can add value as I said, but, in AI, but, I think we need to wait because we like, you know, things are going to evolve hiver, copilot, we need to evolve. So being 100 percent honest with you nowadays, doubling the price to have this feature for us. It's something not good.
